mapper.insert: insert into RRBoard(codeNum, title, category, company, startDate, endDate, bill, contents, registerId, img, adress, spotNum) values(rrb_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{category}, #{company}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{bill}, #{contents}, #{registerId}, #{img}, #{adress}, #{spotNum})

insert into RPBoard(seqNum,codeNum, company, startDate, endDate,userstartDate,userendDate, bill, contents, reaquestId,registerId, adress, spotNum,registerDate) values(rpb_seq.nextval,#{codeNum}, #{company}, #{startDate}, #{endDate},#{userstartDate},#{userendDate}, #{bill}, #{contents}, #{reaquestId},#{registerId}, #{adress}, #{spotNum},SYSDATE)
mapper.update: update RpBoard set PackageStatus=#{packageStatus} where seqNum=#{seqNum}
